title: resource for victorian 'catalogues'?
content:
I’m currently researching a kitchen brochure and the client would like to use some victorian engraving of cutlery as you might find in a catalogue of days gone by. Anyone know on a site that may have something? I’m off to London town to trawl the usual second hand bookshops later this week but sooner would be better…  
Thanks folks.  
G
author: gavin

comments.content: You could also look through the [Dover](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111212943/http:/store.doverpublications.com/by-subject-art-dover-electronic-clip-art-series--cd-rom-.html) collections. Specifically the [Heck](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111212943/http:/www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/search-handle-form/102-2885391-3171369) selections.
Thanks great those books are great!
